AnalogFilter Class Reference

#include <analogfilter.h>

Inheritance diagram for AnalogFilter:

List of all members.

Detailed Description

Base class of all analog filters.

Public Member Functions

  • AnalogFilter (unsigned int kernel_length)
  • virtual ~AnalogFilter (void)
  • virtual int filter (const double *r, double *x, int *indices=0)
  • virtual void createKernel (unsigned int n)=0
  • virtual void reset ()
  • virtual int setNumInputs (unsigned int nInputs)
  • virtual void addChannel ()
  • virtual int updateInternal ()

Public Attributes

  • int nKernelLength
    The length of the kernel.

Protected Attributes

  • double * filter_kernel
    The filter kernel.
  • int oldKernelLength
    The length of the old kernel.
  • int nChannels
    Number of Input channels to filter.
  • int lChannels
    Number of allocated input channels.
  • deque< double > ** dataQueues
    Storage of the last datapoints for low-pass filtering.
  • int nInputAvailable
    Number of data-points received.
  • double dKernelLength
    Dummy variable for parameter setting and getting.

virtual void AnalogFilter::createKernel (  unsigned int  n  )  [pure virtual]
 

Calculates a new filter kernel for the given number of data points.

Parameters:
n Number of data points to filter.

Implemented in GaussianAnalogFilter, TriangularAnalogFilter, and UserAnalogFilter.

double *  x,
int *  indices = 0
)  [virtual]
 

Filter a response signal of the neural microcircuit.

Parameters:
r Response of the neural microcircuit.
x Target vector where to save the results.
indices Indices where to store the results in X.
Returns:
-1 if an error occured, 1 for success.
